Content: The [Key:ARM_UNIQUE_LLWEAPONEX_ArmCannon_A_DisplayName] normally only works with an empty hand or shield. Disabling this allows you to dual-wield it with regular weapons, but this may not be as balanced.
Enable automatically unlocking certain Weapon Expansion recipes when requirements are met, such as shuriken recipes as Throwing Mastery rank 1.
Restrict the total number of remote changes that can detonate at once. If disabled, you can blow up everything in an inventory at once (not recommended for balance).
If enabled, [Key:ARM_UNIQUE_LLWEAPONEX_Backpack_Demolition_A_DisplayName] will automatically recharge over time. If disabled, charges are restored by enemies dying in battle.
Enable the weight limit on [Key:Target_LLWEAPONEX_ThrowObject_DisplayName] (Recommended). If enabled, you can only throw heavy characters if you have 40 Strength or Rank 4 Throwing Mastery.
If enabled, Weapon Expansion uniques will automatically level up to your level when equipped. If disabled, you will need to use another mod to level them up.
If enabled, characters can still gain unarmed mastery experience and scaling damage when using a shield in the offhand, as long as their primary slot is empty.
All unobtained Weapon Expansion uniques will be moved to the Strange Machine, instead of being in specific places or on specific characters. <font color='#FF0000'>This cannot be undone.</font>
